item.title: R-3.6.1 on Ubuntu Bionic
item.description: As detailed in this post, I recently installed Ubuntu on my old MacBookPro (assuming a MacBookPro from mid-2012 is old ğŸ˜). In order to run some simulations I needed to install the latest version of R. I first followed the procedure to install the latest R on Debian before realizing that the backport for Ubuntu are different ğŸ˜! So if you are on Ubuntu, the correct link to install the latest R is here.
